info.title: LP Agent API
info.description:
API for LP Agent

**Rate Limiting**

This API implements rate limiting to ensure fair usage and protect our services. The current rate limit is:

- **5 requests per 1 minute** per API Keys

If you exceed this limit, you will receive a 429 (Too Many Requests) response. Please wait for the rate limit window to reset before making additional requests.

If you need more, please contact us at **thanhle@getnimbus.io** or TG: **@thanhle27**

get.summary: Get opening LP positions for an owner
get.description: Retrieves current liquidity pool positions that are open for a specific wallet owner

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of the position owner

400.description: Bad request - owner parameter is required

get.summary: Get historical LP positions for an owner
get.description: Retrieves historical liquidity pool positions for a specific wallet owner

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of the position owner

400.description: Bad request - owner parameter is required

get.summary: Get overview metrics for LP positions
get.description: Retrieves comprehensive overview and metrics for liquidity pool positions of a specific owner

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of the position owner

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Protocol to filter by (e.g., meteora, orca)

total_pnl.description: Total profit and loss with time ranges

avg_inflow_native.description: Average inflow in native token with time ranges

total_fee_native.description: Total fees in native token with time ranges

total_pnl_native.description: Total PnL in native token with time ranges

win_lp_native.description: Number of winning LP positions in native token

closed_lp.description: Closed LP positions with time ranges

win_rate_native.description: Win rate in native token with time ranges

expected_value_native.description: Expected value in native token with time ranges

roi_avg_inflow_native.description: ROI based on average inflow in native token

avg_pos_profit_native.description: Average position profit in native token

avg_monthly_profit_percent_native.description: Average monthly profit percentage in native token

avg_monthly_pnl_native.description: Average monthly PnL in native token

avg_monthly_inflow_native.description: Average monthly inflow in native token

400.description: Bad request - owner parameter is required

get.summary: Get detailed information for a specific LP position
get.description: Retrieves comprehensive details about a liquidity provider position including status, PnL, tokens, and transaction logs

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position ID/token ID to retrieve

currentValue.description: Current USD value of the position

collectedRewardNative.description: Native token amount of collected rewards

collectedFeeNative.description: Native token amount of collected fees

tickLower.description: Lower tick of the position range

tickUpper.description: Upper tick of the position range

inRange.description: Whether the position is in range

dprNative.description: Daily percentage return in native token

valueNative.description: Current position value in native token

amount0Adjusted.description: Current amount of token0 (adjusted for decimals)

amount1Adjusted.description: Current amount of token1 (adjusted for decimals)

unCollectedFeeNative.description: Total uncollected fees in native token

takeProfitBps.description: Take profit threshold in basis points

stopLossBps.description: Stop loss threshold in basis points

preferNativeValue.description: Whether to prefer native value display

get.description: Retrieves transaction logs for LP positions. Can fetch logs for a specific position of an owner.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: Wallet address of the position owner

amount0.description: Amount of token0 involved in the transaction

amount1.description: Amount of token1 involved in the transaction

price0.description: Price of token0 at time of transaction

price1.description: Price of token1 at time of transaction

strategyType.description: Strategy type used for the position

400.description: Bad request - position or owner parameter is required

message.example: position or owner parameter is required
